spieler_x_vorname.label: Vorname Spieler X
spieler_x_vorname.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

spieler_x_nachname.label: Nachname Spieler X
spieler_x_nachname.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

spieler_o_vorname.label: Vorname Spieler O
spieler_o_vorname.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

spieler_o_nachname.label: Nachname Spieler O
spieler_o_nachname.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

startzeit.label: Startzeit
startzeit.description:
A specific moment in time consisting of year, month, day, hour and minute. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>T<HH>:<MM>` or `null`.

For example: `1879-03-14T11:30`.

spielfeld_status.label: Spielfeld Status
spielfeld_status.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).

spiel.label: Spiel
spiel.description:
A reference to another LivingApp record from a target lookup app (or `null`).

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.

spieler.label: Spieler
spieler.description:
One selected option of multiple available options (or `null`).

The available options are defined in the `lookup_data` attribute of this control's LivingApp.

The field value will be the key in this `lookup_data` attribute or `null`.

position.label: Position auf dem Spielfeld
position.description:
One selected option of multiple available options (or `null`).

The available options are defined in the `lookup_data` attribute of this control's LivingApp.

The field value will be the key in this `lookup_data` attribute or `null`.

zeitstempel.label: Zeitstempel
zeitstempel.description:
A specific moment in time consisting of year, month, day, hour and minute. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>T<HH>:<MM>` or `null`.

For example: `1879-03-14T11:30`.

spiel.label: Spiel

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.
